proc startProcess(command: string; args: seq[string]; passFds = defaultPassFds;
                  env = initTable(); workingDir = ""; daemon = false;
                  fakePty = false): ChildProc {....raises: [OSError],
    tags: [ReadDirEffect, ReadEnvEffect, ReadIOEffect], forbids: [].}
args:
- args[0] should be the process name. Not providing it result in undefined behaviour

env:

- if env is nil, use parent process

file_descriptors:

- parent process is responsible for creating and closing its pipes ends

daemonize: if false: will be closed with parent process else: will survive (but no action on fds is done)

Source   Edit

    ...raises: [OSError, Exception, ValueError], tags: [RootEffect, TimeEffect],
    forbids: [].}
